message: I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $110. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $130. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $125?
I'm willing to compromise, but I think the product is worth more than $125. How about we meet at $140?
I'm still not willing to go up to $140. I'm willing to go up to $128, but that's as high as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me there?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I think the product is worth more than $128. I'm willing to meet you at $145, but that's as low as I can go. It's a fair price considering the value it brings.
